ng-add.description: Add storybook configuration to the workspace

storybook-configure.description: Add storybook configuration to a ui library

storybook-stories.description: Create stories/specs for all components declared in a library

cypress-configure.description: Add cypress e2e app to test a ui library that is set up for storybook

component-cypress-spec.description: Create a cypress spec for a ui component that has a story

component-story.description: Create a stories.ts file for a component
